content.title: Python-based Automation Bots for RuneScape
content.description: Developed a set of automation bots for the video game RuneScape. This project evolved into a complex, modularized system with multiple utility files, enabling rapid development of new bots. The bots utilize visual recognition techniques and simulate mouse and keyboard actions to automate various in-game tasks. A key feature is the Discord integration, allowing remote start, stop, and monitoring capabilities, enhancing the project's versatility and user control.

infoBoxes.title: Technologies
infoBoxes.content: Python, Tkinter, PyAutoGUI, Pynput, PIL, OpenCV, Asyncio, Git

infoBoxes.title: Key Features
infoBoxes.content: Visual recognition, Mouse/keyboard simulation, Modular design, Discord integration

infoBoxes.title: Efficiency
infoBoxes.content: Rapid bot development using custom utility files

infoBoxes.title: Remote Control
infoBoxes.content: Start, stop, and monitor bots via Discord

items.text: This video demonstrates one of the RuneScape bots in action, showcasing its ability to automate in-game tasks using visual recognition and simulated inputs, as well as its Discord integration for remote control.
